eventDecorators.name: AmountWithdrawEvent
eventDecorators.description: Emitted that client terminates the service if the hash(s1) is wrong. Or cloud terminates the service if client does not confirms hash(s1) in time.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted that client terminates the service if the hash(s1) is wrong. Or cloud terminates the service if client does not confirms hash(s1) in time.

functionDecorators.name: claimOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: withdraw function to send token addresses or eth amounts to a list of receivers.

parameterDecorators.name: _destinations
parameterDecorators.description: batch list of token or eth receivers.

parameterDecorators.name: _amounts
parameterDecorators.description: batch list of values of eth or tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenAddresses
parameterDecorators.description: what token to be transfered in case of eth just leave the 0x address.

functionDecorators.name: setWithdrawCreator
functionDecorators.description: setter for the withdraw creator (responsible for calling withdraw function).

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.
